content: Can someone explain how to read crater results? For example, in https://github.com/rust-lang/rust/pull/79073#issuecomment-733986049 lcnr says there are no regressions, but the report seems to indicate 6 regressions? I've seen this sort of thing happen in a few other cases. What am I missing?
The regressions in the report are spurious - e.g. network error
yeah, crater tries to filter failed builds by if they are spurious or not
so i personally tend to look at both spurious regressed and regressed builds to see if anything looks related
to what was actually changed by the PR
